Articles.Content: The player can now click the MET/Date button on the timewarp control to choose what time to show. Please have the game remember what I chose and retain that between flights. For instance, I ALWAYS want to see the current time because I have never had a use for MET.

Mission elapsed time would have more use if there were more consumables in the game, like food, water, and oxygen.

But yes, it would be nice if the game remembered which setting you were on.
